text.content:
Go for the Eyes

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Pinch a Finger

You take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success].

Ranged

Winds of Change

You can't attack the same target again until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed

Now I see You...

Your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Invisible]{Invisible} until the end of its next turn or uses a hostile action.

Spell
